episode.title: Slathered in Incompetence
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Ben Thompson returns to the show. Topics include Apple's quarterly results, the discontinuation of Apple's AirPort product line, and more.
episode.showNotes:
Ben Thompson returns to the show. Topics include Apple's quarterly results, the discontinuation of Apple's AirPort product line, and more.
